body: Hello! This site contains my projects: * 2016 * [ RPi Vibration Measurement](https://loruro.github.io/RPi_Vibration_Measurement/) * [ Zynq FPGA - Median Filter](https://loruro.github.io/Zynq_FPGA_Median_Filter/) * [ Barometer - STM32](https://loruro.github.io/Barometer_STM32/) * 2015 * [ Ultrasonic Anemometer](http://loruro.github.io/Ultrasonic_Anemometer/) * [ Obstacle Avoiding Robot - RoboCORE](http://loruro.github.io/Obstacle_Avoiding_Robot---RoboCORE/) * 2013 * [ 2D Nbody Gravity Simulator](http://loruro.github.io/2D_Nbody_Gravity_Simulator/)
